title: Ground News - Violent attacks against bus drivers soar, forcing Biden admin to take action
text:
Summary The Federal Transit Administration will tackle a surprising and alarming spike in attacks on bus drivers and other transit employees that has arisen over the past few weeks. Share menu More
Filters 1 Articles 1 Articles All Left Center Right
Fox News Right Mixed Factuality Media Conglomerate: Murdoch Family Media Conglomerate: Rupert Murdoch Violent attacks against bus drivers soar, forcing Biden admin to take action Federal authorities and officials have speculated that pandemic anxiety and lockdown frustration may have led to the sharp increase in incidents over the past two years.
